reviews.text: Better signage between the railway station and the underground station would be good. It was easier to navigate when you were doing the building works. The (new) signage took me on a VERY long trip going past just about every shop they have - which I suppose was the idea. I don't come to train stations to do my shopping in boutique shops. I come to catch a train and transfer to another. Please make the interchange easier. But, I must say the platform staff were very helpful. Not the information booth staff though. They were arrogant and walked off whilst  I was talking still to them. How rude.

Love the new look London Bridge station escalator going to the platforms nice big and airy.
The toilet attendant need to pay more attention to the up keep of the toilets. I am aware the toilets get very busy but they smell of urine, around the wash hand basin was disgusting.
Completely renovated in 2018! A lot of shops between the train station and the tube station.

Ticket office staff can only sell certain types of ticket, but there is no signage to make people aware of this. I stood in line for 20 minutes, only be to be told they couldn’t sell the ticket I wanted because it was offered by a different train company.

Clean well built, not sure how good it is if you are not a frequent user as you appear to have to go down to lower level to see where your connection is. Platforms are a bit narrow in places if you suffer from acrophobia
